title: Muthoot Finance's AUM grows 25% to Rs 89,079 cr in FY24
description: Muthoot Finance's consolidated assets under management surged 25% YoY to Rs. 89,079 crores in FY24, with a 22% YoY increase in profit after tax to Rs. 4,468 crores. The chairman emphasized a pivot towards non-gold loan growth and digital strategies, aiming to boost subsidiaries' contribution and expand into diverse financial sectors.
